block.p: COHEN-Howard. Age 75, of Somers, NY, formerly of Bayside, NY. Beloved husband of Ellin. Loving father of Stuart and Gail, Barry and Irene and Susan and Michael Schapiro. Adored grandfather of Jamie, Evan, Tyler, Colby, Jason and Michelle. Brother of Shirley Riback. Funeral service at Clark Associates Funeral Home, Katonah, NY, Monday, 12:30 PM. Interment Cedar Park Cemetery in Emerson, NJ.
